definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="eightyfive" type="Number">eightyfive</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:eightyfive</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PumpkinTenm</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"/><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:eightyfive</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.75</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.PUMPKIN</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:eightyfive</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.25</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.PUMPKIN</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.PUMPKIN_PIE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
